inclusion.criterion: Acute myocardial infarction (STEMI or NSTEMI) within 48 hours from the onset of symptoms.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Refusal to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Proved intolerance to statins on previous use.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Having conditions (or taking medications) that would not allow concomitant safe statins use.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and cardiomyopathy, but no other significant medical history. He is being treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers.
